Blackfang leaps, transforms in mid-air, takes hold of his halberd and 
glares around furiously.

Blackfang: Who's up for some scrap rattling?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Rodimus Prime::
> 
> "That's correct Blackfang. We only atack the Predacons. Leave the 
other group. Only attack them if pervoked."
> 
> They come into the battle.
> 
> "Here we are, Maximals kick ass!"
> 
> Rodimus transformed to bot mode, and fires on the Predacon base with 
his plasma gun.
